name: Ext_R2_Claim_it_net
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Claim.item.net for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Claim.item.net from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Claim|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The quantity times the unit price for an additional  service or product or charge. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not supplied.
element.comment: `Claim.item.net` maps to R4B `Claim.item.net`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: The quantity times the unit price for an additional  service or product or charge. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not supplied.
element.comment: `Claim.item.net` maps to R4B `Claim.item.net`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
